children.qtip: l'IsoThermalité compare l'importance de la variation diurne par rapport à la variation annuelle. Une valeur de 100 représente un site ou la variation diurne égale la variation annuelle. Une valeur de 50 indique un site ou la variation dirurne est égale à la moitié de la variation annuelle.

children.qtip: from MODIS NRT FLoods Map. As the satellite compares areas with water one day and without another day, intertidal zones must be taken into account. The pixel size of 250m does not allow the recording of urban flash floods

areas submerged by a 16m wave (Ward & Day scenario)
children.qtip: This model is not a true hydrodynamic model and should be refined. It takes into account the land use, the slopes (facing the wave or not) and the elevation. A wave of 15 meters should lead to around 340,000 people affected.

children.text: Location of nests of sea turtles on the sea shore between Khartong and Sanyang, according to WWF
children.qcktip: A project, funded by British Embassy, and supported by Sandele Eco-retreat, achieved by members of local communities, allowed a survey of sea turtle nesting between June and October 2014.
